summary: Wilhelmina  was queen of the Kingdom of the Netherlands from 1890 to 1948. She was loved by the Dutch people.
full_text: Wilhelmina  was Queen of the Kingdom of the Netherlands from 1890 to 1948. She reigned for nearly 58 years, longer than any other Dutch monarch. Her reign saw World War I and World War II, the economic crisis of 1933, and the decline of the Netherlands as a major colonial power. Outside the Netherlands she is primarily remembered for her role in World War II, in which she proved to be a great inspiration to the Dutch resistance.
title: Wilhelmina of the Netherlands
